meanings.sent1: The children were overexcited about the upcoming field trip.
meanings.sent2: She always gets overexcited when she sees her favorite band perform live.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was overexcited to see its reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her overexcited laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The overexcited fans cheered loudly at the football game.

meanings.definition: To become excessively excited or enthusiastic.
meanings.sent1: Try not to overexcite the puppy with too much playtime.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overexcite easily when talking about his hobbies.
meanings.sent3: The magician's tricks overexcited the audience, making them gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent4: The news of the surprise party overexcited her to the point of tears.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter overexcited the teacher, who couldn't help but smile.
